hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $6+6$ then add $80$.

> $\begin{align}\\
\greenD{46}+\purpleC{46}=&\greenD{40}+\greenD{6}+\purpleC{40}+\purpleC{6} \\
=&\greenD{6}+\purpleC{6}+\greenD{40}+\purpleC{40} \\
=&\greenD{6}+\purpleC{6}+80 \\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

Add $46+4$ then add $42$.

> $\begin{align}\\
\greenD{46}+\purpleC{46}=&\greenD{46}+(\purpleC{4}+\purpleC{42}) \\
=&(\greenD{46}+\purpleC{4})+\purpleC{42}  \\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategies can be used to add $46+46$.**

- Add $6+6$ then add $80$.

- Add $46+4$ then add $42$.

question.content:
**Select any strategy that can be used to add $46+46$.**
